cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the need for accurate and intelligent search tools in the expanding universe of literature, which is a common topic in the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. The paper also proposes a recommender system, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, making it relevant to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The paper also mentions the importance of capturing and keeping the attention of the target audience, which is related to the Cybersecurity (cs.CY) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the practical feasibility of incorporating the proposed solution into an information retrieval system, which is relevant to the Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-category.
